statements: UPDATE water_conservation_program SET progress = 50, achievements = 'Completed stage 1' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE water_conservation_program SET achievements = 'Reached monthly goal', progress = 75 WHERE participant_id = 2;
UPDATE water_conservation_program SET achievements = 'Reduced water usage by 20%' WHERE participant_id = 100
UPDATE water_conservation_program SET participant_name = 'John Doe', participant_email = 'john.doe@example.com', progress = 3 WHERE participant_id = 200
UPDATE participants SET city='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE achievements SET description='Completed task A' WHERE participant_id=3;
UPDATE participants SET city='New York', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE achievements SET description='Completed project milestone', achievement_date='2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE participant_id=2;
UPDATE participants SET city='New York' WHERE participant_id=1;

UPDATE participants SET age = 25, address = '123 Main St' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_date = '2022-10-15', achievement_description = 'Completed all tasks successfully' WHERE participant_id = 2;
UPDATE participants SET age = 25 WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE activities SET description = 'New description' WHERE activity_name = 'Hiking';
UPDATE participants SET city = 'New York' WHERE age > 30;
UPDATE activities SET difficulty_level = 3, description = 'Intermediate level activity' WHERE program_id = 2;
